description.narrative: By connecting the underprivileged neighborhoods in the north to the city center in the south, the tramway will provide a safe, efficient and environmentally-friendly alternative to road-based transit. The Tramway will be fully electrified, mostly on dedicated lanes running alongside existing roads, thus minimizing environmental impact as well as the need for expropriations. By switching people from cars and buses to the tramway, it will help reduce CO2 emissions along the project corridor. Improved mass transit will offer improved access to employment, education and other opportunities to all residents of the communities served.
